C.content: cartouche is defined: seal, alliance, imperium, family, lines (traits) around an official document
C.linkedContent: cartouche is defined: seal, alliance, imperium, family, lines (traits) around an official document

C.content: paradox of paradigm: deposed from its privilege moment it’s built, inscribed in a series, an out-of-series cartouche > remains heterogenous by virtue of its relief
C.linkedContent: paradox of paradigm: deposed from its privilege moment it’s built, inscribed in a series, an out-of-series cartouche > remains heterogenous by virtue of its relief

C.content: cartouche: puts itself to work, forms part of the work by inscribing (itself) (as) the title, signature, autobiographical performative of the signatory
C.linkedContent: cartouche: puts itself to work, forms part of the work by inscribing (itself) (as) the title, signature, autobiographical performative of the signatory

C.content: primordial place of “father” (presumed paradigm) depends on cartouche-performance—takes w/ one hand what it gives w/ the other (torturous surgery)
C.linkedContent: primordial place of “father” (presumed paradigm) depends on cartouche-performance—takes w/ one hand what it gives w/ the other (torturous surgery)

C.content: production of paradigm via cartouche introduces necessary (fatal) perversion that cartouche alone performs > paradigm must have been preceded by its following: phantasmatics of a contingent remaining (beyond hierarchy, beyond phantasy)
C.linkedContent: production of paradigm via cartouche introduces necessary (fatal) perversion that cartouche alone performs > paradigm must have been preceded by its following: phantasmatics of a contingent remaining (beyond hierarchy, beyond phantasy)

C.content: the topology of the cartouche: parergon (the hors-d’oeuvre’s supplement in the work)
C.linkedContent: the topology of the cartouche: parergon (the hors-d’oeuvre’s supplement in the work)

C.content: [vis-à-vis Freud] father inferred from a sentence, declaration, judgment: “this is the father,” says the cartouche, paternity never touched, unnatural (different matter for maternity)
C.linkedContent: [vis-à-vis Freud] father inferred from a sentence, declaration, judgment: “this is the father,” says the cartouche, paternity never touched, unnatural (different matter for maternity)

C.content: as soon as cartouche doesn’t lay down law, pretending to recite the truth > cartouche as simulacrum transforms paradigm into paradigm effect (w/out destroying it, always something of it)
C.linkedContent: as soon as cartouche doesn’t lay down law, pretending to recite the truth > cartouche as simulacrum transforms paradigm into paradigm effect (w/out destroying it, always something of it)

C.content: Derrida quotes himself from Glas: modesty is no longer in season (de mise) for a cartouche, at the point of death
C.linkedContent: Derrida quotes himself from Glas: modesty is no longer in season (de mise) for a cartouche, at the point of death

C.content: [la cartouche is a cartridge] dissemination of cartouches/cartridges (en tous sens, en tout genre) never exhausts a total > no total of meaning and genres (masculine/feminine)
C.linkedContent: [la cartouche is a cartridge] dissemination of cartouches/cartridges (en tous sens, en tout genre) never exhausts a total > no total of meaning and genres (masculine/feminine)

C.content: coffin’s mutism: always a box in a box, some supplementary cartridge, a parergon > hors la boîte, fors la boîte: necessity to steal coffin (each time, differently) inscribed right on the “thing,” right on the cartouche [congenital perjury of justice]
C.linkedContent: coffin’s mutism: always a box in a box, some supplementary cartridge, a parergon > hors la boîte, fors la boîte: necessity to steal coffin (each time, differently) inscribed right on the “thing,” right on the cartouche [congenital perjury of justice]

C.content: who signs the theft? Cartouche as great robber: this is my cartouche, I stole it, I am it, this is the body of my name > Cartouche left an institution: commonizing of proper name
C.linkedContent: who signs the theft? Cartouche as great robber: this is my cartouche, I stole it, I am it, this is the body of my name > Cartouche left an institution: commonizing of proper name

C.content: that which is entitled Cartouches is itself a series of cartouches, the title describes place, structure, form of text: voici des cartouches, ceux que je suis [follow/am] [cf. “Counterfeit Money”]
C.linkedContent: that which is entitled Cartouches is itself a series of cartouches, the title describes place, structure, form of text: voici des cartouches, ceux que je suis [follow/am] [cf. “Counterfeit Money”]

C.content: I am myself cartouche and cartouches(s) in the plural: “I” sign myself to death as soon as there’s the title, reduce myself to first heading, capital, shrunken head
C.linkedContent: I am myself cartouche and cartouches(s) in the plural: “I” sign myself to death as soon as there’s the title, reduce myself to first heading, capital, shrunken head

C.content: Cartouches, its singular performance (hapax, only once) simultaneously entitles & signs: I sign, therefore we sign cartouche(s) [m/f]
C.linkedContent: Cartouches, its singular performance (hapax, only once) simultaneously entitles & signs: I sign, therefore we sign cartouche(s) [m/f]

C.content: contingent can do w/out discourse, a masterpiece can’t do w/out a cartouche (on the market & in itself: if you insist on this distinction) > even when the cartouche remains, is defunct: pas de cartouche, plus de cartouche > what will have been able to do w/out it? never touched, aussi impassible et invulnérable qu’aux harcèlements du trait: c’est peut-être qu’il était déjà dans la tombe, le cartouche
C.linkedContent: contingent can do w/out discourse, a masterpiece can’t do w/out a cartouche (on the market & in itself: if you insist on this distinction) > even when the cartouche remains, is defunct: pas de cartouche, plus de cartouche > what will have been able to do w/out it? never touched, aussi impassible et invulnérable qu’aux harcèlements du trait: c’est peut-être qu’il était déjà dans la tombe, le cartouche

C.content: order of narrative, whose trap has been situated by logic of cartouche
C.linkedContent: order of narrative, whose trap has been situated by logic of cartouche

C.content: unity of a period (of a detour) is indeterminable: each article presents perforated cards that transform the other > tombe, in the snare (dans le lacs)
C.linkedContent: unity of a period (of a detour) is indeterminable: each article presents perforated cards that transform the other > tombe, in the snare (dans le lacs)
